title: HWI KLD100 Kevlar Lined Duty Gloves, Black
features: Contour cut design for natural fit
100% High grade aniline dyed goatskin leather outer offers great feel and abrasion resistance
Contour cut design for natural, snug fit, perfect for searches, shooting or any task where dexterity is key
Kevlar liner for cut resistant protection
Hook and Loop closure for snug secure fit
description: The KLD100 has the classic look and feel of an all leather duty glove with a more modern functional design. The contour cut and high grade aniline goatskin make the KLD100 an extremely comfortable high abrasion resistant glove. For the protection of the duty officer a full Kevlar liner is added for cut resistance.
High grade aniline goatskin leather offers great feel and abrasion resistance

"HWI gloves are designed by Bill Hatch, the man that many consider to be the father of the tactical glove industry. HWI Gear is Bill's new venture, and his experience and expertise in this market can be seen in the design, performance and quality of these HWI gloves.

HWI Gear is a major supplier of combat gloves to the U.S. Army. They are committed to providing the most innovative, high-quality gloves to the those who serve in law enforcement and the military. We are proud to offer our customers these top-of-the-line gloves."
